name: RapidScale Clusters
overview:
RapidScale Clusters was founded in 2008 to bring ease of use to linux clustering. Our tools provide solutions to many difficult system administration problems and make highly available and scalable Linux clusters very easy to create.

Our technology has been under development since 2005. As Linux in the datacenter gained momentum, we worked harder and faster to bring our software to market. Now, for the first time, we are happy to announce the availability of ClusterMaker, our flagship software.

Management Team While our management roster can not be publicly disclosed at this time, RapidScale Clusters, LLC has a sharp and experienced leadership team. With U.S. and international software industry experience at the CEO, CTO, and CFO positions, we are well positioned for our upcoming product launches.

Location We are headquartered in New York in the United States. As we expand our market and geographic presence, we look forward to providing our software to Linux shops all over the world.
